DOC.brief_summary: Randomisation 72 large rural area ( `` block '' ) 2 x 2 trial six- monthly treatment village child age 1-5 albendazole ( 400mg ) , vitamin A ( 200000 iu ) , neither . The placebo group get trial treatment receive physical placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Deworming Enhanced Vitamin A Every 6 Month Rural Indian Children Aged 1-6
